title: Best OCE skin idea EVER!!!
body:
Seems like everyone is spitting the dummy about this new OCE skin but I've seen no good alternative suggestions. So I've taken it upon myself to present the best skin idea ever.

Skin Name*: Twisted Fate Lad
*open to suggestions 

Abilities: Q - throws out 3 half sucked durries
               W - picks either a pack of winnie    gold, red or blue. 
               E - for his 4th empowered attack he could get one of his mates to king hit the prick from behind. 
              R - instead of teleporting he'd jump the train and full tag it up all hectic.

The skin would include a bum bag, TN's, nautica hat, polo shirt and of course a southern cross because that's what we aussies are all about ay Rito.

replies.body: Why are we not funding this

now I understand why riot didn't use a skin that a community member suggested.
because they're all shit.
**LMAFO I Love it, since i'm from south west sydney ;) and dress like a lad i rep nike 24/7, i'll love this skin **
